Class RightClickMenu

java.lang.Object
RightClickMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class RightClickMenu extends Object implements ActionListener
Creates a popup menu, should be used for right click functionality

      public void callMenu(int width, int height)
      Allows the menu to be called when the right button is clicked
      Parameters:
      width - Where in the x axis the menu should appear
      height - Where in the y axis the menu should appear

      Parameters:
